description:
Carry bear spray in your water bottle cage, for unexpected encounters on the trail. The friction fit holds the canister securely, so you can grab it and pull it quickly out of the holster.

  • Made of plastic that protects the canister from impacts
  • Fits in standard water bottle cages and 225g pepper spray canisters
  • Also works with zip ties to attach anywhere on your bike frame
name: Kodiak Singletrack 225g Bear Spray Holster
